name: Icarus10
description:
When done playing, please give us feedback here: https://forms.office.com/e/YC2qqj5Rzh

You are in a ship that is having some issues. Problems keep happening and you are too close to the sun. Do your best to fix the issues before the ship crashes into the sun!

Controls:

  • A and D to move left/right
  • E to interact with an object or area
  • F to fire the fire extinguisher when interacting with fire area
  • Up and Down arrows to aim fire extinguisher
  • Space to jump
